nodes.text: Sal Ghator was a male Yuuzhan Vong who was living in the mixed class village of La'okio on Zonama Sekot. A former subaltern, Sal was caught by the Extolled Bava, stealing out of the Extolled's crops, who brought this information to Tahiri Veila. Sal didn't believe in living with former Shamed Ones.
